name: aster
label: Asters
text: The name Aster comes from the Ancient Greek word meaning star, referring to the shape of the flower head.

name: carnation
label: Carnations
text: Carnations require well-drained, neutral to slightly alkaline soil, and full sun. Examples include Gina Porto, Helen and Red Rocket.

name: daffodil
label: Daffodils
text: Daffodil is a common English name, sometimes used for all varieties, and commonly used by the American Daffodil Society

name: rose
label: Roses
text: A rose is a woody perennial within the family Rosaceae. They form a group of erect shrubs, and climbing or trailing plants.

name: orchid
label: Orchids
text: The orchid family is a diverse and widespread family in the order Asparagales. It is one of the largest families of flowering plants.
